job.title: Software Engineer, Data Products
job.description: ltstronggtltugtCompany DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtSquare builds common business tools in unconventional ways so more people can start run and grow their businesses When Square started it was difficult and expensive or just plain impossible for some businesses to take credit cards Square made credit card payments possible for all by turning a mobile phone into a credit card reader Since then Square has been building an entire business toolkit of both hardware and software products including Square Capital Square Terminal Square Payroll and more Were working to find new and better ways to help businesses succeed on their own termsand were looking for people like you to help shape tomorrow at SquareltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtJob DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtGood decisionmaking is only possible when you have trustworthy and reliable data along with the right tools and systems to process analyze and consume that data The Data Products Engineering team is tasked with writing and maintaining a suite of selfservice data productivity and discovery applications and services integral to Squares data ecosystemltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAs An Engineer On The Data Products Engineering Team You WillltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtYou are an experienced software engineer ready to bring your skills towards building modern  next generation data solutionsltbrgtltulgtltligtWrite performant clean modern applications and services to improve productivity and customer experienceltligtltligtBe selfdriven in identifying and documenting feature gaps and designing and implementing solutions to themltligtltligtContribute to the monitoring stability and security of our existing servicesltligtltligtCommunicate technical designs in writing and in person to all kinds of audiencesltligtltligtUnderstand our partnersampapos needs and assist turning their requests into scalable featuresltligtltligtMentor other engineers and help them grow code reviews guidance on best practices leveraging your experience in the fieldltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtQualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtWorking proficiency in the English languageltligtltligtExperience working in large fullstack web applications 2 years minimumltligtltligtExperience developing in JavaScriptTypeScript Ruby Python Java or GoltligtltligtExperience developing frontend web applications in Ember React Vue or other frameworksltligtltligtExperience working with relational databases such as MySQL and PostgreSQLltligtltligtExperience with cloud environments such as AWS and GCPltligtltligtExperience with container deployment platforms and tools such as Kubernetes Docker Helm and TerraformltligtltligtBonus Experience with or desire to learn querying cloudbased data warehouses Snowflake Redshift etcltligtltligtBonus Experience with AirflowltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtAdditional InformationltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtAt Square we value diversity and always treat all employees and job applicants based on merit qualifications competence and talent We do not discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability status We will consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance Applicants in need of special assistance or accommodation during the interview process or in accessing our website may contact us by sending an email to assistanceatsquareupcom We will treat your request as confidentially as possible In your email please include your name and preferred method of contact and we will respond as soon as possibleltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtPerksltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtAt Square we want you to be well and thrive Our global benefits package includesltbrgtltulgtltligtHealthcare coverageltligtltligtRetirement PlansltligtltligtEmployee Stock Purchase ProgramltligtltligtWellness perksltligtltligtPaid parental leaveltligtltligtPaid time offltligtltligtLearning and Development resourcesltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltemgtSquare Inc NYSE SQ builds tools to empower businesses and individuals to participate in the economy Sellers use Square to reach buyers online and in person manage their business and access financing Individuals use Cash App to spend send store and invest money And TIDAL is a global music and entertainment platform that expands Squareampaposs purpose of economic empowerment to artists Square Inc has offices in the United States Canada Japan Australia Ireland Spain Norway and the UKltemgt
